versiondescription: The RA-5C is an reconnaisance version of the A-5B. It saw extensive service in the Vietnam War.
notes: Reconnaissance options include an oblique camera, overhead cameras, IR camera, side-looking radar, and electronic emissions recording equipment.
loadnotes: Station 3 is the internal weapons tube. It can carry one nuclear BB and two FTs or three FTs.
Although capable of carrying weapons internally and externally, in practice only three internal FTs and no external weapons or FTs were carried.
